features: Realistic Glass Flameless Candles - These smoke grey glass led candles has real flame effect, real wax in glass holder, flickering softly and giving off a warm white glow, creating a cozy feeling.
Remote Control & Timer Function - You can control all candles with remote control(on/off, bright/dim, 4/8 hours timer function) within 20 feet.
Battery Operated Candles - Each led candle is powered by 2 x AA battery ( not included) with flickering effect (fixed flame), lasting over 350 hours, LED bulb has a 50,000+ hours life.
SAFE & No Mess - Lifelike look while unscented, no drips, no smoke, no hazard, our candles safely go where traditional flame candles can’t, perfect for your home with kids and pets.

3 Pack Candles Gifts Set - Well box packaged, it comes with 3 pieces grey glass candles, 3 inch diameter, 4/5/6 inch tall, 1 user manual, 1 remote, these beautiful grey candles are great decorations for home, table, wedding and also ideal as holiday gifts, like Christmas, Father's Day.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Eywamage Smoke Grey Glass Flickering Flameless Pillar Candles with Remote These candles are in mirror-like glass with simulated black wick flickering flame, setting a festive mood and a comforting ambiance. The smoke grey color would blend in with most any decor, your bathroom, bedroom, living room and kitchen, or your patio for a couple of dinners with friends.

Not Just Look, Details Matter ! High Quality Material Made by real wax, poured real wax into glass jar, not cheap plastic or acrylic, you can feel the difference. A warm white glow reflects well, add a inviting atmosphere. Made of real wax with a LED light inside, please do not expose the candle directly to the sun or close to fire. Convenient Remote & Timer-Ready Each candle set includes 1 remote controller, which allows you to turn candles on/off, set timer, set flickering flame or steady light, adjust brightness within 20 feet. please remove the insulating sheet inserted in the remote controller before use.

Battery Powered & Long Battery Life Each candle is powered by 2 AA batteries ( not included), lasting over 350 hours, much longer battery life than other brands. Remote takes 1 cr2025 coin cell ( also included). Bright & Realistic Eywamage glass flameless candles emulate the look of real candles, flameless, smokeless, windproof, dripless, no fire risk, especially friendly for family having naughty kids or pets, great decor and gifts. Silver grey, amber gold, red, green, pink, clear and more colors are available.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this product and couldn't be more pleased. Would buy it again in a heartbeat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value, love these candles!
reviews.reviewText: I love this set of candles! They are realistic and easy to use. It comes with a remotes that works well. He only con is that the remote doesnt work from a long distance, so I can't turn the lights on or off from the couch. I need to be pretty close to them for the remote to work, but it's not terrible. I've had the candles for a few weeks and they still work fantastic. They have a timer and are dimmable at varying levels. I'm buying more because I love them and use them daily in the living room as relaxing evening lights. My husband jokes that we need 50 more to put all over the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ditch the Drips, Embrace the Glimmer: These Flameless Candles are a Dream!
reviews.reviewText: Forget those plastic flickering eyesores. These candles are encased in beautiful clear glass that reflects the LED light, creating a warm, flickering glow that's practically indistinguishable from real flames.Goodbye Soot, Hello Serenity:No more soot stains on walls or lungs full of smoke! These flameless candles are clean and allergen-free, making them perfect for families with pets or anyone who wants to breathe easy. Plus, no open flame means no fire hazards, so you can relax and enjoy the ambience without worry.Convenience is King:The remote control is a game-changer. Turn them on and off, adjust the brightness, and even set a timer from the comfort of your couch. It's like having a tiny, flameless fireplace at your fingertips!Versatility Galore:These candles aren't just for windowsills. They add a touch of elegance to dining tables, mantles, bookshelves, even bathrooms. Whether you're hosting a romantic dinner or creating a cozy reading nook, these candles set the mood perfectly.Bonus Points:The batteries last surprisingly long, and the glass looks sleek and modern. They also make fantastic gifts for everyone on your list!Final Verdict:If you're looking for flameless candles that are realistic, convenient, and safe, look no further! These Clear Glass Flameless Candles with Remote are the real deal. Ditch the messy wax and soot, and embrace the glow of a worry-free, magical flame.Rating: 5 out of 5 flickering flames!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unique animal candles
reviews.reviewText: Since I am an animal lover these candles were perfect for my collection of them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe and flameless
reviews.reviewText: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐I recently purchased the Eywamage Grey Glass Flameless Candles with Remote, and I'm thrilled to provide them with a five-star review. These battery-operated flickering LED pillar candles, made with real wax and featuring a beautiful grey glass design, have exceeded my expectations. Here's why I highly recommend the Eywamage Grey Glass Flameless Candles:1. **Realistic Flickering Effect:** The flickering LED lights perfectly mimic the natural flicker of real candles. This realistic effect creates a warm and cozy ambiance, making these candles a perfect addition to any space.2. **High-Quality Craftsmanship:** The combination of real wax and the grey glass design showcases high-quality craftsmanship. The attention to detail in both materials and construction adds an elegant touch to the candles.3. **Multiple Sizes:** The set includes candles in three different sizes (Φ 3" H 4" 5" 6"), providing versatility in decorating and styling. The graduated sizes look beautiful when displayed together, adding dimension to the arrangement.4. **Convenient Remote Control:** The included remote control enhances the convenience of using these candles. It allows for easy operation, including turning the candles on/off and adjusting the brightness and flickering mode.5. **Battery Operated:** The use of batteries eliminates the need for cords or outlets, providing flexibility in placing the candles anywhere in the home. The long battery life ensures extended usage before needing replacements.6. **Safe and Flameless:** These flameless candles offer a safe alternative to traditional candles, especially in households with children or pets. The absence of an open flame reduces the risk of accidents while still providing a charming glow.7. **Versatile Decor:** The grey glass design adds a touch of sophistication, making these candles suitable for various decor styles. They work well in both contemporary and traditional settings, making them a versatile home accessory.8. **Ideal for Special Occasions:** Whether for a romantic dinner, a relaxing bath, or a special celebration, these candles create a beautiful and romantic atmosphere. The flickering light enhances the overall ambiance, making any occasion more memorable.In conclusion, the Eywamage Grey Glass Flameless Candles with Remote are a delightful addition to any home. Their realistic flickering effect, high-quality craftsmanship, and versatile design make them a standout choice for creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. I confidently give these candles a five-star rating and highly recommend them for anyone seeking a safe and elegant alternative to traditional candles.

The media could not be loaded. Love them so much I ordered for my sisters for gifts! Packaged extremely well, arrived fast. Paid a few dollars for gift bags and note for my sister’s and they were beautifully presented and delivered. The remote works well and I love the way they flicker and highlight the glass. I've purchased many fake candles and theses are exceptional! The silicone type flames don't move they are reflective as shown inthe video. You need 2AA batteries for each. These would be stunning at an event like a wedding or anniversary. Don't hesitate! ✨BTW the bigger candle in video not sold buy company. I already owned it. You get 3 small candles. See sizes

Nice and light and look like a real candle is burning inside them. The timer option is great, you can turn them on and forget about them and they will turn off themselves and then back on at the same time each day.
